name: Clark W. Barrett
content: Clark Barrett's Home Page Clark Barrett Stanford University Research Interests Automated reasoning; satisfiability modulo theories (SMT); formal methods; formal verification; verification of smart contracts; verification of neural networks; AI safety; hardware design productivity and verification.
